alert.note: Alert for Chickasaw; Floyd; Howard (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 14 at 5:22PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeast Iowa near and east of Charles City through 600 PM CDT... At 520 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Charles City, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Ionia around 530 PM CDT. New Hampton and Elma around 535 PM CDT. Jerico around 540 PM CDT. Protivin around 550 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Vernon Springs County Park, Vernon Springs, Chickasaw, New Hampton Airport, and Alta Vista. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
